Parameters: The @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase_E@ containing the information about the purchase.
onInAppPurchaseRequested(com.google.andr.Description: Called when the user clicks an In-App purchase ad. The publisher is responsible for starting an In-App purchase flow, and calling @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase#recordResolution_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase#recordPlayBillingResolution_E@ when the In-App purchase flow is completed to report the resolution.

ClassDesc: A listener interface for In-App Purchase triggered by ads. The ad can trigger an In-App Purchase with an @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchase_E@ containing product id(SKU). The application then decides how to conduct the purchase.
